title: Comprehensive Session Documentation - Knowledge Graph Integration
description: Complete session documenting knowledge graph restoration and usage. Primary task: verify knowledge graph functionality after previous context overflow. Discovered distributed architecture (Neo4j, Redis, TaskMaster SQLite, JSON entries) was operational but missing Claude Code integration bridge. Created comprehensive integration scripts, documented infrastructure mapping, GitHub sanitization methodology, multi-agent system discovery. Successfully restored mandatory knowledge graph protocols and documented all discoveries for institutional knowledge preservation.
